modName: Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Bane of the Dragonkin
summary: Since the Dovah have reawakened, untold horrors have been afflicted upon the Norse villages of Skyrim, small villages raised to the ground, women and children alike killed by the Dragonkind. Who will protect the weak? The Ancient order of [i]Feyn Do Fin Dovah[/i] has returned with the coming of Alduin and his Dovah.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/b/b3/Dragon_F.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/1/17/Dragon_ey.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/f/ff/Dragon_N.png[/img]  [img][/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/3/3c/Dragon_D.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/8/80/Dragon_O.png[/img] [img][/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/b/b3/Dragon_F.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/4/46/Dragon_I.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/f/ff/Dragon_N.png[/img] [img][/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/3/3c/Dragon_D.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/8/80/Dragon_O.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/f/f9/Dragon_V.png[/img][img]http://images.wikia.com/elderscrolls/images/9/98/Dragon_ah.png[/img][/center]

[b][center] [i]Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Bane of the Dragonkin[/i] [/center][/b]

[b]This mod requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277]Omegared99 - Armor Compilation[/url] mod for this too work! Reason is I use some of his armor  and weapons and don\'t include it with my download![/b]

[b]Forum Threads[/b]
[url= http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/720468-feyn-do-fin-dovah-bane-of-the-dragonkin]Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Bane of the Dragonkin: Help Request[/url]
[url= http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=720286]Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Bane of the Dragonkin: Story[/url]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=720287]Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Bane of the Dragonkin: Ideas[/url]

[b]About?[/b]
What is [i]Feyn Do Fin Dovah[/i] - Bane of the Dragonkin about?

Currently the story goes like this.

Since the Dovah have reawakened, untold horrors have been afflicted upon the Norse villages of Skyrim, small villages raised to the ground, women and children alike killed by the Dragonkind. Who will protect the weak? The Ancient order of [i]Feyn Do Fin Dovah[/i] has returned with the coming of Alduin and his Dovah.

The [i]Feyn Do Fin Dovah[/i] are an ancient order of knights, who did not seek out Dragons, but spent most of their life\'s learning how to fight them when the need arises. Currently they have returned to Skyrim after learning how to use the Dragon tongue. A few of these brave knights now reside at Dragons Bridge.

[b][center]NOTE: if you don\'t select any optional mods then nothing new will show in game![/center][/b]
[b]Goals of this mod? [/b]
[list=1]
[*]Create a new join able faction which is lore friendly.
[*]Add many new quests relating to Dragons and Hopefully the blades.
[/list]

[b] Nothing showing up?[/b]
Make sure you have Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Bane of the Dragonkin.esm activated.
Make sure you have the Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Update.esp activated and loaded before all other Feyn Do Fin Dovah esps
Make sure you have at least some optionals activated! since they ADD the content, Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Bane of the Dragonkin.esm is the base of the mod and [b]ADDS NOTHING VISABLE![/b]

[b] Current Plugins [/b]
[list=1]
[*]Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Update [i]Updates the main esm, providing fixes and or new features to the base of the mod, merged when required.[/i]
[*]Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Dragon Bridge [i]Adds the Feyn Do Fin Dovah Knights and a captain to dragon bridge and a small test quest.(sit down on a barstool)[/i]
[/list]

[b]Want to help?[/b]

Also look here for other ways you can help out!
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=720287 for Ideas!
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=720286 For the Story!

If you\'d like to create you\'re own set of quests or whatever use the Feyn Do Fin Dovah (Bane of the Dragonkin).esm as your mods master, it will contain all the templates and itemlists used in the default mod. if you\'d like to edit an area I\'ve already edited either use my esm and esp as masters or if you edit the esp itself, contact me before you post it for permission.

[b]Load order.[/b]
Feyn Do Fin Dovah (Bane of the Dragonkin).esm
Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Update.esp
Then all other Feyn Do Fin Dovah addons.

NOTE: The update ESP will be merged with the ESM when there are major changes to the core of the mod.



On another note, I will be working on a village, perfecting it then moving too the next village or quest plugin etc.

Once Dragon Bridge is complete i\'ll start on the guild area, then the first quest pack then finally more villages and quests.

Feel free to add your own quests or villages by using the esm as a master.
author: Happy-I-am

files.name: Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Update
files.changelogHtml:
Level lists fixed via Update.esp
Faction members now have topics about their order.l
Dragon Bridge Plugin updated, quest fixed, idles added to quest.
Feyn Do Fin Dovah - Kruziik Hall started. first major plugin.
